About Miss Refrain

Miss Refrain is a natural dominatrix in everday life and by nature, she is referred to as a 'domme' or 'dominant' and is a person who is naturally suited to a dominant role in BDSM (Bondage, Discipline, Dominance, Submission, Sadism, and Masochism) activities and within a professional capacity in the BDSM industry, she also engages in dominance and submission dynamics in her personal relationship.
